bioconda.name: bioconductor-mbased
bioconda.summary: Package containing functions for ASE analysis using Meta-analysis Based Allele-Specific Expression Detection

biotools.summary: The package implements the corresponding algorithm for detecting allele-specific gene expression from RNA count data, where allele counts at individual loci (SNVs) are integrated into a gene-specific measure of ASE, and utilizes simulations to appropriately assess the statistical significance of observed ASE.
